name: assault
column3: a sudden or violent physical attack

name: burglary
column3: people (thieves) entering into a house or building

name: explosion
column3: destructive event of something blowing apart

name: robbery
column3: thieves taking money unlawfully by force or threat of force

name: stealing
column3: people taking property or money without permission

name: shoplifting
column3: stealing goods from a shop while posing as a shopper

name: vandalism
column3: destruction of or damage to public or private property
